DOC.detailed_description: This study open label randomize control trial adult DM2 patient see ED service John H. Stroger Hospital Cook County serve largely uninsured/underserved population . Individuals 18 year age DM2 , either new onset DM2 know diabetic take oral hypoglycemic agent 2 week , present fast blood glucose ( FBG ) 300-500 mg/dl random blood glucose ( RBG ) 400-700 mg/dl exclusion criterion list Table 1 , eligible study . Subjects randomize one two fix dose treatment group : 1 ) Glipizide XL 10 mg orally daily prior breakfast ( G group ) , 2 ) Glipizide XL 10 mg orally daily along Insulin Glargine 10 unit bedtime , subcutaneously ( G+G group ) .
